summary: A proper cleaned up version of the default female body texture, which removes the dirty look.
descriptionHtml:
This .zip contains the textures femalebody_1.dds and femalehands_1.dds, which (I believe) are used for all non-beast races. The texture has been cleaned up to remove the dirty look. I kept the subtleties of the default texture, including its resolution.

At the time of uploading this, a similar texture replacer already exists. I made this because the aforementioned existing replacer is a blurred version of the default texture, which I thought was understandable, but unacceptable for me.

Install:
Backup data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalebody_1.dds and data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalehands_1.dds if they exist and you would like to reverse this mod at some point. Extract contents of .zip into Skyrim root directory(The same location with the exe and current data file), accept all overwrites.

Uninstall:
Delete data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalebody_1.dds and data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalehands_1.dds, restore backup if it exists.
author: Imrinfected
